report_title: Industry at a Glance: Homeopathic Medicine Manufacturing
executive_summary: Operators in the Homeopathic Medicine Manufacturing industry develop prescription and over-the-counter homeopathic remedies, which are derived from substances that come from plants, minerals or animals. Unlike orthodox medicines, homeopathy holds the belief that the human body is holistic and has the ability to self-cure....

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Operators in the Homeopathic Medicine Manufacturing industry
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Operators in the Homeopathic Medicine Manufacturing industry develop prescription and over-the-counter homeopathic remedies, which are derived from substances that come from plants, minerals or animals. Unlike orthodox medicines, homeopathy holds the belief that the human body is holistic and can self-cure.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Industry revenue growth over past 5 years
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Over the five years to 2022, industry revenue benefited from the expansion of its prime customer base, including the number of adults over 50 years old and children under nine years old. As both demographic is vulnerable to common ailments such as cold, flu, and allergies, demand for homeopathic medicines rises as these demographics expand. Ultimately, industry revenue is anticipated to grow 3.7% to $181.9 million over the five years to 2022. To the industry's detriment, an expected fall in total health expenditure is anticipated to cause revenue to fall 0.9.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The homeopathic medicine manufacturing industry's target market, which includes young children under nine and adults over 50 years old, is expected to rise, bolstering industry demand. Overall, industry revenue is expected to expand an annualized 1.2% to $192.7 million over the five years to 2027.

The affordability and safety of homeopathic medicines will appeal to a larger number of customers over the next five years, especially after the COVID-19 pandemic. Amid the pandemic, sales of Boiron's cough-cold and flu medicines including Oscillococcinum, ColdCalm, ThroatCalm and SinusCalm surged 50.0% from the previous year, according to Drug Store News (DSN). Although the pandemic has subsided, consumers are paying more attention to prevention, thus boosting demand for homeopathic remedies, as they are chemical-free and safe to use for preventive purposes.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Growth in number of enterprises and employees
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: As a result of these favorable trends, more operators will enter the industry, with industry enterprises growing an annualized 7.0% to 14 companies over the five years to 2027. Following suit, they will hire more employees to meet up expansion plan, leading industry employment to expand an annualized 2.7% to 428 people during the same five-year period. However, strong growth in wage expenses is expected to cut into profitability over the next five years.

industry_definition: This industry develops prescription and over-the-counter homeopathic remedies, which are derived from substances that come from plants, minerals or animals. Homeopathic remedies are generally formulated as sugar pellets to be placed under the tongue. They may also come in other forms, such as ointments, gels, drops, creams and tablets.

mixed_impact_factors: Barriers To Entry Level: medium - steady

key_trends: Industry revenue benefited from the expansion of its prime customer base, including the number of adults over 50 years old and children under nine years old
The resurgence of homeopathy has induced new homeopathy medicine manufacturers to enter the industry over the past five years
Homeopathic medicines are gaining more acceptance
The number of industry operators is growing

market_segmentation.segment_description: Since Homeopathic Medicine Manufacturing industry operators produce over-the-counter (OTC) homeopathic medicines, retail channels make up more than half of industry revenue. As most industry products are safe for self-medicated, customers do not need to obtain prescriptions from their physicians to purchase industry products.

Non-retail channels represent healthcare providers such as clinics and hospitals. An expected 13.7% of industry medicines has been distributed through clinics in 2022, representing the largest industry customers in the non-retail segment.
In 2022, exports are expected to account for 18.5% of total industry revenue. Over the past five years, exports in proportion to total revenue have increased, albeit at a marginal rate.

products_and_services.product_description: Due to the immunity-boosting properties of many natural substances, a large share of homeopathic medicines are cold and flu medicines. In 2022, cold and flu medicines makes up an estimated 39.8% of Homeopathic Medicine Manufacturing industry products.
Homeopathic medicines for pain relief usually contain Belladonna, Arnica, and Aconitum Napellus. These products usually come in the form of gel, cream, spray and tablets.
Many homeopathic medicine manufacturers specialize in producing children's medicines. Homeopathic medicines are favored by parents due to their natural, chemical-free, low-risk and safe properties.

tier_1_suppliers: Medical Supplies Wholesaling in the US
Industrial Machinery & Equipment Wholesaling in the US
tier_2_suppliers: Medical Device Manufacturing in the US
Agriculture, Forestry, Fishing and Hunting in the US
tier_2_buyers: Pharmacies & Drug Stores in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_description: Product prices directly affect demand for industry products. Consumers will substitute homeopathic medicines if they are more expensive than conventional OTC drugs.
In general, patients will likely choose the medicines that are covered by their insurance provider.
A burgeoning elderly population drives demand for industry products.

international_trade_points.trade_description: Over the past five years, although an appreciated US dollar has dampened industry demand in foreign markets, many industry operators have strong brand recognition.
While US dollars have appreciated over the past five years, industry imports have conversely declined.

business_locations.location_description: In the West region, California, which is the state with the highest number of industry players.
Conversely, Colorado takes second place at 12.8% of industry operators.
Despite having the largest population, the Southeast is the third-largest region.
Similarly, nearly half of New Jersey's industry operators are located in the Mid-Atlantic region.

regulations_points.regulation_description: Industry operators must comply with FDA regulations regarding quality, purity, strength, and packaging.
The FTC requires manufacturers to state that health claims are not supported by scientific evidence.

barriers_points.barrier_description: Manufacturers must comply with Current Good Manufacturing Practice (CGMP) regulations regarding the manufacturing, processing, and packing of medicines.
Ingredients used to produce homeopathic medicines are common substances.
Major players have the advantage of economies of scale and purchasing power.

basis_points.basis_description: Prices play a pivotal role in the competition for market share.
Homeopathic medicines compete directly with orthodox over-the-counter (OTC) medicines.

concentration_points.concentration_description: The top three players account for over 30.0% of industry revenue in 2022.

cost_factors.cost_factor_title: Homeopathic pharmaceuticals are made up of common substances
cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Homeopathic pharmaceuticals are made up of common substances.
Industry products do not have to go through clinical trials.

cost_factors.cost_factor_title: Lower risks in new product development
cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Unlike orthodox pharmaceutical producers, industry operators incur lower risks associated with new product development.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: The Homeopathic Medicine Manufacturing industry is characterized by a low level of capital intensity.
The production process must be carefully monitored to ensure quality.

volatility_points.volatility_description: Industry demand is affected by several external factors.

volatility_points.volatility_title: Fluctuations due to weather and participation rates
volatility_points.volatility_description: As flu and cold medicine makes up the largest segment of industry products.
Amid the COVID-19 pandemic, industry demand rose sharply.

technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Electronic prescriptions and electronic health records have helped streamline healthcare.
The manufacturing process must be closely monitored to ensure quality and purity.

FAQs.question: How is your company affected by rising imports?
FAQs.answer: Homeopathic products manufactured in Europe and other countries are a source of intense competition.

FAQs.question: Have you benefited from import decline amid the coronavirus pandemic?
FAQs.answer: Many operators also benefited from the CARES Act, which was passed in March 2020.

FAQs.question: How much does your company allocate to marketing expenses?
FAQs.answer: On average, an industry operator allocates 1.5% of total revenue on advertising and promotion.
